query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `command_whitelist` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `pattern` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `category` VARCHAR(100),
  `is_active` ENUM('yes', 'no') DEFAULT 'yes' NOT NULL,
  `created_by` INT NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `category_idx` (`category`),
  INDEX `is_active_idx` (`is_active`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `command_blacklist` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `pattern` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `severity` ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') DEFAULT 'medium' NOT NULL,
  `requires_confirmation` ENUM('yes', 'no') DEFAULT 'yes' NOT NULL,
  `is_active` ENUM('yes', 'no') DEFAULT 'yes' NOT NULL,
  `created_by` INT NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `severity_idx` (`severity`),
  INDEX `is_active_idx` (`is_active`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `command_audit` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `user_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `agent_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `command_id` INT,
  `command` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `action` ENUM('allowed', 'blocked', 'confirmed') NOT NULL,
  `reason` TEXT,
  `matched_rule` VARCHAR(500),
  `severity` ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical'),
  `ip_address` VARCHAR(45),
  `user_agent` TEXT,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `user_id_idx` (`user_id`),
  INDEX `agent_id_idx` (`agent_id`),
  INDEX `action_idx` (`action`),
  INDEX `created_at_idx` (`createdAt`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 46yA7HaDwBP5MYq.c5fbe4e16cff --database ALEjofy2PjgFnShwZRqCD7 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `command_whitelist` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `pattern` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `category` VARCHAR(100),
  `is_active` ENUM('yes', 'no') DEFAULT 'yes' NOT NULL,
  `created_by` INT NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `category_idx` (`category`),
  INDEX `is_active_idx` (`is_active`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `command_blacklist` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `pattern` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `severity` ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') DEFAULT 'medium' NOT NULL,
  `requires_confirmation` ENUM('yes', 'no') DEFAULT 'yes' NOT NULL,
  `is_active` ENUM('yes', 'no') DEFAULT 'yes' NOT NULL,
  `created_by` INT NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `severity_idx` (`severity`),
  INDEX `is_active_idx` (`is_active`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `command_audit` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `user_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `agent_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `command_id` INT,
  `command` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `action` ENUM('allowed', 'blocked', 'confirmed') NOT NULL,
  `reason` TEXT,
  `matched_rule` VARCHAR(500),
  `severity` ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical'),
  `ip_address` VARCHAR(45),
  `user_agent` TEXT,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `user_id_idx` (`user_id`),
  INDEX `agent_id_idx` (`agent_id`),
  INDEX `action_idx` (`action`),
  INDEX `created_at_idx` (`createdAt`)
);
